channel.title: Moparforia! Custom minigolf private server
channel.description:
[b][size=14pt]Welcome!![/size][/b] I know a large proportion of Moparscape members would list one of their pastimes as playing playforia minigolf. But have you ever had the lust for more? Well look no further, this IS the topic for you. Before I start please check out our official promotional poster and more importantly video. VIDEO: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/54200156/ridge_forrester.mp4 POSTER: http://i.imgur.com/S998cja.gif [b][size=14pt]So what the hell is this about?[/size][/b] In the first BIG project Moparscape has seen in almost half a decade, Speljohan, vortex, eXemplar and I have created custom minigolf. Yeah, that's right, we've modified the minigolf client and written a private server!!!. The main advantage of this is the ability to have tracks that [b]YOU[/b] have created! Yeah, you heard me, custom tracks! Before we release the client and host the server we need to finish on a few finishing touches but more importantly some custom maps/tracks. To become our own religion and take over the world, the moparforia team have ONE request, [b]MAKE US SOME MAPS!!![/b] :D :D :D :D [b][size=14pt]TL;DR[/size][/b] Please create some maps and either upload the *.track files or simply Copy and Paste the contents of them in a pastebin or even in your post. DOWNLOAD::: http://guarded-forest-6456.herokuapp.com/editor/launch.jnlp (It's a webstart so just open it in browser and it should launch the application straight away) [b][size=14pt]How do I use this thing?!?![/size][/b] It works on the same principle as mspaint, you can select two colours with left and right click. You must set a track name on Track->Preferences. You can then use File->Save to save your track. Here's a REALLY useful cheat sheet as to how to use the editor: [img]http://i.imgur.com/4eQ4VZc.png[/img] [b][size=14pt]Demonstration[/size][/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2MTrDhkwLiU [b][size=14pt]View other peoples map online[/size][/b] As a temporary solution if you wish to see other people's maps online please use the following site and paste the MAP DATA into the text box and click Load Map: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/54200156/trackviewer/trackviewer.html eg you paste the bit in bold:
V 1 A editor N best track fi T [b][/b]
On a serious note, please post any questions, bugs, problems etc you're having with the editor. The more tracks you produce, the quicker we can get this thing live, so I'm counting on you Moparscape! Love from: Fat Cookies xoxoxoxoxox [size=1pt]For nostalgic purposes: http://pastie.org/private/acvzlp9v5po4ixzge992g[/size]

item.title: Moparforia! Custom minigolf private server
item.dc:creator: @qoq
item.description:
@qoq wrote:

Ok, look. I know you’re wondering why I’m bumping this 5 year old thread.

With playforia.com shut down, the need for a working private server is growing.

I know there’s a repository at github with what seems to be a complete moparforia project (/WorldStarHipHopX/playforia) but my knowledge of building/compiling java projects is virtually non existent.

If anyone knows any means of contacting the original moparforia dev team – I will greatly appreciate it.
If anyone is able to help with deploying the project from github – I’m willing to pay.

Discord: Mish Mish#6240
Email: qoq.qoqovich@gmail.com

Thanks and sorry again if this necropost upsets your feelings.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparforia! Custom minigolf private server
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

nade:

Brb writing hax for your private server.

Already written one ourselves Also worked on official server, I had fun fucking with people! As far as I know the official server/client has changed so our client does not connect anymore.

Pure_:

We don’t cheat since it doesn’t prove anything, we will be using the default client so they will probably work anyways.

Uhh, yeah we do…
Plus the current we use is pretty modified to be honest.

Read full topic
